mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID ( REQ_CD, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, BID_CONTACT_NAME, BID_CONTACT_PHONE, BID_STATUS, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{bidContactName}, #{bidContactPhone}, #{bidStatus}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.update: UPDATE BID SET BID_PRICE = #{bidPrice}, BID_CONTACT_NAME = #{bidContactName}, BID_CONTACT_PHONE = #{bidContactPhone}, BID_STATUS = #{bidStatus}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BID WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid}
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", BID_CONTACT_NAME AS "bidContactName", BID_CONTACT_PHONE AS "bidContactPhone", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid}

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", BID_CONTACT_NAME AS "bidContactName", BID_CONTACT_PHONE AS "bidContactPhone", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid} FOR UPDATE

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", BID_CONTACT_NAME AS "bidContactName", BID_CONTACT_PHONE AS "bidContactPhone", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQ_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqCd}, '%') AND BID_UID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidUid}, '%') AND BID_PRICE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidPrice}, '%') AND BID_CONTACT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidContactName}, '%') AND BID_CONTACT_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidContactPhone}, '%') AND BID_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidStatus}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", BID_CONTACT_NAME AS "bidContactName", BID_CONTACT_PHONE AS "bidContactPhone", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${reqCd} ) AND ( ${bidUid} ) AND ( ${bidPrice} ) AND ( ${bidContactName} ) AND ( ${bidContactPhone} ) AND ( ${bidStatus} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID_HT ( REQ_CD, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, BID_CONTACT_NAME, BID_CONTACT_PHONE, BID_STATUS, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{bidContactName}, #{bidContactPhone}, #{bidStatus}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'C' )

INSERT INTO BID_HT ( REQ_CD, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, BID_CONTACT_NAME, BID_CONTACT_PHONE, BID_STATUS, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{bidContactName}, #{bidContactPhone}, #{bidStatus}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'U' )

INSERT INTO BID_HT ( REQ_CD, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, BID_CONTACT_NAME, BID_CONTACT_PHONE, BID_STATUS, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{bidContactName}, #{bidContactPhone}, #{bidStatus}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'D' )
